page.title: 04HOME LIFE IN STURTON 2
page.content: TRADITIONAL BREAKFASTS OF{BACON AND {EGGS}ARE STILL COOKED ALTHOUGH{CEREALS {AND TOAST}ARE NOW MORE USUAL. A MAIN MEAL WOULD BE OF{MEAT/FISH}WITH {VEGETABLES}FOLLOWED BY A{DESSERT.}THIS WOULD BE SUPPLEMENTED WITH A THIRD, LIGHTER MEAL TO COMPLETE A DAILY INTAKE OF{3 MEALS. 'READY TO EAT' MEALS FOR HOME CONSUMPTION CAN BE BOUGHT FROM THE TWICE WEEKLY VISITING MOBILE{FISH AND CHIP VAN}OR{CHINESE & {INDIAN}TAKE AWAY FOOD SHOPS IN LOCAL TOWNS. AVERAGE WEEKLY FOOD COSTS {Â£32.24.} {INDIVIDUAL PRICES INCLUDE:- BREAD {46p}LARGE LOAF BUTTER {9Op}PER LB EGGS {8Op}PER DOZEN TEA {Â£1.68 }PER LB FLOUR {49p}PER 3.31LB BEEF TOPSIDE {Â£2.45} PER LB CHICKEN {8Op}PER LB
